pageContext.claim: “And the typical family earning $75,000 is saving more than $2,000 of their income. So they're picking up $2,000 every year because of this.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump fails to mention that tax cuts for individuals phase out in a few years, unlike tax cuts for corporations. Moreover, for many families, payroll taxes take up the largest chunk of their tax bill, but Trump is referring to a reduction in income taxes.
